casebody.data:
Mary C. Underwood v. John Steel and others. Beard January 8. Decided January 14. H. II. Coolidge é Son, for complainant. C, B. Potter and II. F, Severens, for defendants.

Deed : Mistake. Cummings v. Freer, supra, p. 128, affirmed.

Appeal in Chancery from Berrien Circuit.

This was a bill to correct mistakes in certain deeds.

The controversy was mainly upon questions of fact, and the only legal propositions involved were held to have been settled by former decisions of this court. — Cummings v. Freer, supra, p. 128, was referred to and approved.

The decree of the coiirt below was affirmed, with costs.
